lead_paragraph: EPSTEIN--Stewart, 76, died February 26, 2016 after a heroic fight with Parkinson's Disease. A man of great human decency and character, Stewart will be remembered in the hearts of his wife Karen, sons Joshua and Ross (Amy), grandchildren Sydney, Olivia, Jordan and Kate and sister Roni (Jerry). He will leave an unfillable hole in the lives of his family and friends and will be missed forever. Graveside service Sunday, 1pm at New Montefiore Cemetery. For info: Jewish-funeral-home.com 1/3
